text-home: Presentation of NextJS concepts and features for reuse in a project.
goals-texte-1: The Next.js framework is at the heart of the project and allows us to integrate features such as server-side rendering (SSR), static pre-rendering (SSG), and optimized route management, based on React.
goals-texte-2: Features, while allowing for rapid evolution and easy maintenance.
goals-texte-3: This project is designed so that every developer on the team can easily contribute thanks to a clear structure and modern tools such as Docker and WSL 2.
register-text: Create your account to access a vast library of ready-to-use components, as well as other advanced features.
technology-next: Next.js: React framework for building websites and applications with optimized features.
technology-docker: Docker: Containerization to standardize the development environment and simplify deployments.
technology-wsl: Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL 2): For Windows developers, providing a development experience close to Linux.
technology-vscode: Visual Studio Code (VS Code): The recommended code editor, with extensions to facilitate development under Next.js and Docker.
text-securitisation: This page is secured by an SSL/TLS protocol to protect your information.
pattern-lastname: Last Name can only contain letters, spaces, and hyphens.
pattern-firstname: First Name can only contain letters, spaces, and hyphens.
min-password: The password must contain at least 8 characters, an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number, and a special character.
existUserError: This email is already in use.
emailRequired: The email is required and must be a string.
name: Name
